name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.task.exit.timeout.check-interval-ms
description:
The interval in milliseconds between which the MR framework
  checks if task attempts stay in finishing state for too long.

name: dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.connect-timeout
description:
SSH connection timeout, in milliseconds, to use with the builtin
    sshfence fencer.

name: dfs.namenode.lease-hard-limit-sec
description: Determines the namenode automatic lease recovery interval in seconds.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data.buffer.kb
description:
Buffer size for intermediate encrypt data in kb
  default is 128

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.backoff.monitor.pending.blocks.per.lock
description:
When loading blocks into the replication queue, release the namenode write
    lock after the defined number of blocks have been processed.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.
